org.treetank.api

Interface IStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Storage

    public interface IStorage
    This interface describes storage-instances handled by Treetank. A IStorage is a persistent place where all data is stored. Resources must be created within this IStorage with the help of ResourceConfigurations. //Creating the Storage Storage.createDatabase(new StorageConfiguration(FILE)); final IStorage storage = Storage.openStorage(FILE); //Getting a ResourceConfiguration over Guice. storage.createResource(mResourceConfig); The access to the data is done with the help of ISessions: //Ensure, storage and resources are created final IStorage storage = Storage.openStorage(FILE); final ISession session = storage.getSession(new SessionConfiguration(RESOURCENAME, KEY)); final IPageReadTrx pRtx = session.beginPageReadTransaction(REVISION); final IPageWriteTrx pWtx = session.beginPageWriteTransaction();
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Method Detail

      • createResource

        boolean createResource(ResourceConfiguration pResConf)
                       throws TTIOException
        Creation of a resource. Since databases can consist out of several resources, those can be created within this method. This includes the creation of a suitable folder structure as well as the serialization of the configuration of this resource.
        Parameters:
        pResConf - the config of the resource
        Returns:
        boolean with true if successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        TTIOException - if anything happens while creating the resource

      • getSession

        ISession getSession(SessionConfiguration pSessionConf)
                    throws TTException
        Getting the session associated within this database.
        Parameters:
        pSessionConf - SessionConfiguration reference
        Returns:
        the session
        Throws:
        TTException - if can't get session

      • truncateResource

        void truncateResource(SessionConfiguration pResConf)
                      throws TTException
        Truncating a resource. This includes the removal of all data stored within this resource.
        Parameters:
        pResConf - storing the name of the resource
        Throws:
        TTException - if anything weird happens

      • existsResource

        boolean existsResource(String pResourceName)
        Is the resource within this database existing?
        Parameters:
        pResourceName - ot be checked
        Returns:
        true, if existing; false otherwise

      • listResources

        String[] listResources()
        Listing all resources within this database.
        Returns:
        all resources

      • getLocation

        File getLocation()
        Getting the file location of this database.
        Returns:
        the File of this database

      • close

        void close()
           throws TTException
        Closing the database for further access.
        Throws:
        TTException - if anything happens within treetank.
